mapper.select:
SELECT a.uid uid, a.statistics_city_name cityName, b.table_info tableInfo, apply_date FROM t_oa_purchase_shortlisted a LEFT JOIN t_oa_active_form b ON a.uid = b.uid WHERE b.table_name = '资格入围结果' and a.statistics_city_name is not null and a.statistics_city_name != '' and a.statistics_city_name != '西安体育会展平台公司' and a.statistics_city_name != '东安湖体育公园项目公司'
and DATE_FORMAT(a.apply_date, '%Y-%m-%d') >= DATE_FORMAT(#{param.startTime}, '%Y-%m-%d')
and DATE_FORMAT(a.apply_date, '%Y-%m-%d') <= DATE_FORMAT(#{param.endTime}, '%Y-%m-%d')
ORDER BY a.statistics_city_name
